Room.Name: Western Crystalline City
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a western block of the crystalline city.
Room.LongDescription: To the north you see the bustling movement of a large crowd of crystallines. It's not possible to determine what they are doing without getting closer, but they seem to be excited about something. To the east there is a tower which is protected by a squadron of crystalline guards standing before the tower's gate. You probably cannot enter from this side.
